title: Taylor Guitars Font
content:
I am looking for the font used by Taylor Guitars:

[https://www.taylorguitars.com/taylorware/Item.aspx?itemid=1011&categoryid=1006&page=1#](http://web.archive.org/web/20101107074337/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%253A%252F%252Fwww.taylorguitars.com%252Ftaylorware%252FItem.aspx%253Fitemid%253D1011%2526categoryid%253D1006%2526page%253D1%2523)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101107074337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/taylor-T_dt_5937.jpg)
author: myaeger

comments.content: It's a hand drawn logo, as many are, but you might like [Roman Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20101107074337/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/roman_script_alternate/?sample_text=Taylor&sample_size=74&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).
